mapper.insert: INSERT INTO club_board (club_board_no, club_id, emp_no, board_category, clubboard_title, clubboard_content, clubboard_regdate, clubboard_hitcount) VALUES (CLUB_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{club_id}, #{emp_no}, #{board_category}, #{clubboard_title}, #{clubboard_content}, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.select:
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM club_board cb JOIN club c ON cb.club_id=c.club_id WHERE cb.board_category=#{board_category}
AND

SELECT cb.club_board_no, e.emp_name, cb.board_category, cb.clubboard_title, cb.clubboard_content, TO_CHAR (cb.clubboard_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') clubboard_regdate, cb.clubboard_hitcount FROM club_board cb JOIN emp e ON cb.emp_no=e.emp_no WHERE cb.club_board_no=#{club_board_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE club_board SET clubboard_hitcount=clubboard_hitcount+1 WHERE club_board_no = #{club_board_no}
mapper.select:
SELECT cb.club_board_no, cb.clubboard_title FROM club_board cb JOIN emp e ON cb.emp_no=e.emp_no JOIN club c ON cb.club_id=c.club_id WHERE cb.club_id=#{club_id} AND cb.board_category=#{board_category} AND (club_board_no > #{club_board_no})
AND
ORDER BY club_board_no ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
